user.description:
Enter your Statens vegvesen API key.

You can apply for an API key at:
https://www.vegvesen.no/dinside/data-og-api-er/tilgang-til-api-for-kjoretoyopplysninger/vis

init.title: Vegvesen Vehicle Lookup Options
init.description: Configure debounce behaviour for vehicle lookups.

data_description.debounce_seconds: Seconds to wait after the last text change before performing a lookup. Set to 0 to look up immediately on every change.
data_description.fallback_lookup_seconds: Maximum seconds to wait after the first text change before forcing a lookup, even if the user keeps editing. Acts as a safety net. Set to 0 to disable.
